**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 14,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Heavenly radiance shines from an active _celestial staff,_ a golden staff capped with a pair of sculpted [angel's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=3) wings. Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. While wielding a _celestial staff_, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that have the [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) trait and effects created by evil creatures. When you prepare this staff, if you're evil, you become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) until your next daily preparations.
  • **Cantrip** [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=84) (good only)
  • **1st** [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [_protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=238)
  • **2nd** [_continual flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=50), [_inner radiance torrent_](/Spells.aspx?ID=934)
  • **3rd** [_circle of protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), [_sanctified ground_](/Spells.aspx?ID=265)
  • **4th** [_holy cascade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=151), _inner radiance torrent_
  • **5th** [_spiritual guardian_](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [_summon celestial_](/Spells.aspx?ID=317)
  • **6th** _holy cascade_, _summon celestial_
  • **7th** [_angel form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=862), _inner radiance torrent_, _summon celestial_
**Craft Requirements** You're good. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Celestial Staff
